contentrichtext.text: '''Yates''' may refer to a common surname: [[Yates (surname)]] The following places in the United States are named Yates: *[[Yates, Michigan]] *[[Yates, Montana]] *[[Yates, New York]] *[[Yates County, New York]] *[[Yates, West Virginia]] *[[Yates City, Illinois]] *[[Yates Township, Illinois]] *[[Yates Township, Michigan]] *[[Yates Center, Kansas]] '''Yates''' may also refer to: *[[Yates (company)]], New Zealand and Australian gardening company *[[Yates Racing]], NASCAR team *[[Yates's]], pub chain in the United Kingdom ==See also== *[[Yates and Thom|Yates and Thom Ltd]], engineering company from [[Blackburn]], [[Lancashire]]. *[[Yates v. United States]], United States First-Amendment case *[[Yeates (disambiguation)]] *[[Yeats (disambiguation)]] *[[Yate (disambiguation)]] {{disambig}} [[Category:Place name disambiguation pages]]
